sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,1,733503978,Dr. Sulaiman Alhabib,Dr Sulaiman Al Habib Medical Center,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/dr-sulaiman-alhabib/id733503978?uo=4,0.0,4.04169,18015,Medical,"Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib Application is a free and provides a wide range of Electronic Services to all Dr. Sulaiman Al Habib Medical Services Group's Clients. The Application reflects the medical group focus on quality services and commitment towards providing premier healthcare services and Cutting Edge technology to its valued patients.
The Application supports the Arabic & English Languages and has the following features:

column2: Insurance approval status and view insurance cards
Find a doctor and ask your doctors
Track your blood sugar, pressure, and weight

column1: Dr. Sulaiman Al-Habib Medical Services Group is a highly reputable and one of the largest providers of comprehensive healthcare services in the Middle East. Its continuous success in providing the highest quality of medical care has set a benchmark in the Arab region, as it is currently operating 18 Medical Projects in Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates and Bahrain.
HEALTH APP INTEGRATION:
This shows you the following data from the Health app (HealthKit):
- Steps
- Walking + Running Distance
- Flights Climbed (Floors)
- Cycling Distance
- Workouts (Read only)
- Exercise Minutes (Read only)
- Active Energy
- Wheelchair Distance
- Swimming Distance
- Resting Calories (BMR)
- Weight
- Heart Rate (Read only)
- Sleep Analysis
This App uses background location tracking to show you the latest offers by HMG when you visit any HMG branch.

eservices.hmg@drsulaimanalhabib.com",2013-11-29T05:41:05Z,2025-11-16T06:16:51Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,2,6749816825,Almana | المانع,Almana General Hospital,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/almana-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%85%D8%A7%D9%86%D8%B9/id6749816825?uo=4,0.0,4.36606,336,Medical,"Almana is a smart healthcare application designed to make managing your medical journey easier and more convenient. With a simple and secure registration process, Almana allows you to seamlessly book and manage your appointments, access your medications, and review your approval history in just a few taps. The application also supports appointment check-in, profile updates, and adding dependents to help families manage healthcare under one account. Built with the latest technology and enhanced user experience, Almana ensures that patients receive smooth and reliable access to their medical services anytime, anywhere.

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,7,6740854812,Malafi | ملفي,National Guard Health Affair (NGHA),https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/malafi-%D9%85%D9%84%D9%81%D9%8A/id6740854812?uo=4,0.0,3.51724,58,Medical,"The Ministry of National Guard Health Affairs introduces the Malafi mobile application that provides patients easy access to their medical information at any time and place. sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,8,6450965754,Dexcom ONE+,"DexCom, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/dexcom-one/id6450965754?uo=4,0.0,2.125,64,Medical,"Diabetes goes where you go, now your glucose readings can too, with the Dexcom ONE+ Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) system and mobile app†.

With the Dexcom ONE+ mobile app†, users can access their real-time glucose readings at a glance and set customisable alerts that can help warn of highs and lows, all with no finger pricks* or scanning. Discuss with your healthcare professional how you should use the information displayed on the Dexcom ONE+ to help manage your diabetes.
The Dexcom ONE+ mobile app† has been designed with enhanced features to help in the management of diabetes:

column2: The app-led onboarding allows users get started in a few clicks only.

Share your glucose data with up to 10 followers who can monitor your glucose data and trends on their compatible smart device with the Dexcom Follow app. Share and Follow functions require an internet connection.
Key diabetes metrics displayed in the Clarity Card section of the mobile app, so that users can see both real-time and retrospective glucose data.**
Event logging where users can track activities like meal intake, exercise sessions and insulin injections, helping them better understand their glucose patterns.1
Alerts to notify users 12-hours before the end of a sensor session, so you can change your sensor when it’s convenient for you.1

column1: Apple Watch:

column2: View your glucose information, trend graph, and alerts right from your wrist with the Dexcom ONE+ Apple Watch app. Watches require compatible smart device to use app.

column1: Learn more at Dexcom.com.
This app is only for use with the Dexcom ONE+ Continuous Glucose Monitoring System.
*If your glucose alerts and readings from the Dexcom ONE+ do not match symptoms or expectations, use a blood glucose meter to make diabetes treatment decisions
† Smart device sold separately. For a list of compatible devices, visit www.dexcom.com/compatibility.
**An internet connection is required for patients to send their glucose data to Dexcom Clarity via a compatible smart device: dexcom.com/compatibility.

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,10,1612207127,Mouwasat Hospital,Mouwasat Medical Services Co.,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/mouwasat-hospital/id1612207127?uo=4,0.0,4.78346,41364,Medical,"نلتزم بتقديم افضل الخدمات الطبية في جميع التخصصات الرئيسية والفرعية من خلال الكوادر الطبية المتميزة المؤهلة من أرقى الجامعات المحلية و العالمية باستخدام أحدث ما توصلت إليه التقنية في مجال التجهيزات الطبية لتحقيق أفضل مستوى من الجودة والسلامة للمرضى.
يتيح تطبيق المواساة للهواتف الذكية لكم الحصول على مجموعة واسعة من الخدمات الإلكترونية الفريدة والتي نهدف من خلالها الى جعل تجربتكم أسرع وفي منتهى السهولة.
حجز المواعيد، استعراض المواعيد القادمة والسابقة، الأدوية الحالية والسابقة، النتائج الطبية، الموافقات الطبية، الفواتير، ربط أفراد العائلة

We are committed to providing the best medical services in all major and sub-specialties through distinguished qualified medical cadres from the most prestigious local and international universities using the latest technology in the field of medical equipment to achieve the best level of quality and safety for patients.

The Mouwasat application for smartphones allows you to access a wide range of unique electronic services, through which we aim to make your experience faster and easier. Integrated with the Health app (HealthKit) to seamlessly access and track your health data. This allows us to present your information in an intuitive and visually appealing way while enabling our doctors to provide you with more accurate and personalized assessments.
Appointment Scheduling, Appointments Histories, Medications, Medical Approvals, Invoices, Sick leaves, Dependents.",2022-04-26T07:00:00Z,2025-10-28T16:02:33Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,11,6452676846,Meena Health,MEENA HEALTH MEDICAL COMPANY,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/meena-health/id6452676846?uo=4,0.0,3.15551,463,Medical,"Meena Medical Group is redefining how healthcare is delivered, making it more accessible, convenient, and patient-focused. We provide care that adapts to people’s lifestyles and needs through a model built on flexibility, clinical excellence and integrated support.
Our key services:
In-Clinic Care: Comprehensive primary care offered at Meena Centers for those who prefer in-person visits.
Virtual Clinics: Video consultations and virtual services that make it easier for patients to access medical care, prescriptions, and follow-ups without visiting a clinic.
Home Health Care: Hospital-quality care delivered at home, including chronic disease management, rehabilitation, elderly care, women and children health, vaccinations, remote monitoring and more.

Occupational Healthcare: A full-spectrum service designed to enhance employees well-being, safety and productivity. Through on-site clinics and telehealth solutions, Meena Health supports everything from pre-employment screenings and risk assessments to injury management, rehabilitation, and compliance with Saudi NCOSH and international standards.

The Meena Health app is your all-in-one digital health platform in KSA, offering seamless, patient-first care that adapts to your life. Whether you need to book an in-clinic appointment, prefer a digital clinic experience or you’re looking for home health care services, Meena Health puts comprehensive care at your fingertips, with services designed for the whole family.
Key Features:
Doctor & Clinic Profiles with Verified Reviews
With detailed doctor and clinic profiles, in addition to real patient reviews, you can choose the right doctor with confidence.
In-Person, Virtual or Home Care Appointments
Easily book doctor appointments online in Saudi Arabia, whether you prefer virtual video consultations or in-person visits or you need hospital-at-home services.
Video Consultations
Video consultations are fully integrated into the app.
Linking to Insurance
You can link directly with insurance with no hassle
Comprehensive Profile for Patients and Their Families

You and your family can access your medical history, view prescriptions, receive medications and download your medical reports effortlessly, including lab results, radiology reports, and doctors notes.
Real-time Alerts & Notifications
Receive personalized appointment reminders, medication alerts, and other updates via SMS, email or push notifications.
Health Tracking & Integration with Smart Devices
Connect wearables through Samsung Health to track hydration levels, steps, blood pressure, and more, and get alerts for unusual readings
User-Friendly Experience
Tailor your experience with digital tools that adapt to your health needs
Flexible Payment Options
Pay medical bills online
Why Meena Medical Group?

Meena Medical Group is transforming primary care in Saudi Arabia by seamlessly integrating innovative digital solutions with personalized in-person medical care. Our comprehensive approach offers accessible, convenient and high-quality healthcare designed specifically around your individual needs. At Meena, we empower you with flexible, patient-centered care, ensuring your health journey is always within your control whether online, at home or in the clinic.
Healthcare Tailored to Your Lifestyle
Whether you prefer in person visits or virtual appointments, Meena Health makes it easy to access healthcare services in the way that suits you best.
Support Across Every Specialty
From family medicine to chronic condition management and physiotherapy, Meena Health brings together experienced medical professionals to guide every step of your health journey.
Comprehensive Wellness Programs
We offer programs that promote physical, emotional, social and mental wellbeing. Each is designed to empower you and help you feel better every day.

We believe the ideal care experience starts with diverse, inclusive choices. Download the Meena Health app to access healthcare services designed around for needs",2023-08-29T07:00:00Z,2025-11-13T06:59:34Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,12,1597732266,Altakhassusi,King Faisal Specialist Hospital and Research Center,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/altakhassusi/id1597732266?uo=4,0.0,4.76206,23468,Medical,"KFSH&RC have launched Altakhassusi Application which enables users to access their health care records anywhere anytime to perform several tasks and submit requests too which includes the following:
- Health Profile, Gives an overview of the most recent information as recorded in patients’ health records.
- Appointments, This feature enables you to view your own and your dependent, upcoming appointments Postpone or cancel existing appointments
- Medical Conditions, View a list of Diagnosis and Complaints as obtained from the electronic health record
- Medications, View a list of their current and inactive medications, request prescription renewals.
- Health Maintenance, View a list of procedures or immunizations recommended for you based on age, gender and medical history.
- Immunization, View a list of immunizations either taken or recommended for you based on age, gender and medical history
- Laboratory Tests, View details of any future or completed laboratory tests and procedure results
- Radiology, View reports of all completed Radiology exams and procedure.
- Documents, View or request all kinds of medical reports including like discharge summaries or medical evaluation
- Vital Signs, View values and graphs for your vital signs, height and weight as documented on each visit
- Surgical Procedures, View details of completed surgical procedures
- Pathology, View reports of all completed Pathology tests and procedure.
- Hospital Visits, View the details of your previous hospital visits to outpatient, inpatient and emergency department.
- Supplies, View and request approved, supplies required for you or your dependents
- Personal Profile, Provides personal information and emergency contacts address

The goal of this initiative was driven by promoting “Patient Experiences” through meeting their growing expectations and satisfying their demands by effective engagements through the use of technology as an efficient and effective communication platform.",2022-01-16T08:00:00Z,2025-08-20T06:33:09Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,13,1338938836,FreeStyle LibreLink – SA,Abbott Diabetes Care Inc,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/freestyle-librelink-sa/id1338938836?uo=4,0.0,3.72486,865,Medical,"The FreeStyle LibreLink app is approved for use with FreeStyle Libre and FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensors. You can check your glucose by scanning your sensor with your phone. Now FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensor users can get automatic glucose readings in the FreeStyle LibreLink app, updated every minute, and also receive alarms when your glucose is low or high. [1][2]
You can use the FreeStyle LibreLink app to:
* View your current glucose reading, trend arrow and glucose history
* Receive low or high glucose alarms with FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensors [2]
* Add notes to track your food, insulin use and exercise
* See reports, such as Time in Range and Daily Patterns
* Share your data with your doctor and family, with your permission [3]
SMARTPHONE COMPATIBILITY
Compatibility may vary between phones and operating systems. Learn more about compatible phones at http://FreeStyleLibre.com.
USING YOUR APP AND READER WITH THE SAME SENSOR

Alarms can only be issued on your FreeStyle Libre 2 reader or your phone (not both). To receive alarms on your phone, you must start the sensor with the app. To receive alarms on your FreeStyle Libre 2 reader, you must start the sensor with your reader. Once the sensor has been started with the reader, you can also scan that sensor with your phone.

Remember that the app and reader do not share data with each other. For complete information on a device, scan your sensor every eight hours with that device; otherwise, your reports will not include all your data. You can upload and view data from all of your devices on LibreView.com.
APP INFORMATION

FreeStyle LibreLink is intended for measuring glucose levels in people with diabetes when used with a sensor. For more information on how to use FreeStyle LibreLink, refer to the User’s Manual, which can be accessed through the app. If you require a printed User’s Manual, contact Abbott Diabetes Care Customer Support.
Consult a healthcare professional to confirm if this product is right for you or if you have questions about how to use this product to make treatment decisions.
Learn more at http://FreeStyleLibre.com.
[1] If you are using the FreeStyle LibreLink app, you must also have access to a blood glucose monitoring system, as the app does not provide one.
[2] Alarms that you receive do not include your glucose reading, so you must scan your sensor to check your glucose.
[3] Use of FreeStyle LibreLink and LibreLinkUp requires registration with LibreView.
The sensor housing, FreeStyle, Libre, and related brand marks are marks of Abbott. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
For additional legal notices and terms of use, go to http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

To resolve any technical or Customer Service issues that you are having with a FreeStyle Libre product, please contact FreeStyle Libre Customer Service directly.",2018-09-27T01:51:42Z,2025-06-12T20:05:30Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,17,6466983244,Kesay Clinics,RUKN ALKESSAY MEDICAL COMPANY,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/kesay-clinics/id6466983244?uo=4,0.0,3.89157,83,Medical,"استعيدي نضارة بشرتك وصحة شعرك مع تطبيق مجمع عيادات الكسائي الطبية – العناية تبدأ من هنا

حمّلي الآن تطبيق مجمع عيادات الكسائي الطبية و ابدئي رحلتك نحو الجمال والعناية الصحية مع نخبة من أطباء الجلدية وخبراء التجميل والليزر. سواء كنتِ تبحثين عن العناية بالبشرة، علاج تساقط الشعر، إزالة الشعر بالليزر، أو عيادة تجميل موثوقة  كل هذا وأكثر نقدّمه لكِ بجودة عالية وسهولة حجز من هاتفك.
نقدّم باقة واسعة من الخدمات الطبية والتجميلية باستخدام أحدث التقنيات في مجال الجلدية، التقشير الكيميائي والليزر، وحقن الفيلر والبلازما، لتحصلي على نتائج طبيعية وآمنة.
لماذا تطبيق عيادات الكسائي؟
تطبيقنا مصمم ليمنحكِ تجربة سهلة ومتكاملة للحصول على:
تنظيف البشرة العميق والعلاجات المتقدمة
علاج تساقط الشعر وتعزيز نموه
إزالة الشعر بالليزر لكافة أنواع البشرة
فيلر الشفاه وتحديد الملامح
شد الوجه بدون جراحة
التقشير الكيميائي والليزر لتجديد البشرة
إزالة التجاعيد والعلامات الدقيقة
حقن البلازما لتجديد خلايا البشرة
علاج آثار الحبوب والبقع الداكنة
علاج التصبغات الجلدية وتوحيد اللون
خدمات عيادة جلدية متكاملة
المميزات الأساسية للتطبيق:
فتح ملف جديد أو الوصول لملفك الطبي الحالي بسهولة وفي دقائق معدودة.
تصفح مجموعة واسعة من الخدمات الطبية والتجميلية، مع إمكانية شرائها مباشرة من التطبيق.
عروض حصرية متجددة و متوفرة فقط عبر التطبيق.
اختيار الطبيب المناسب لك بناءً على التخصص، الخبرة، المؤهلات، وتقييمات العملاء.
إدارة المواعيد بكل سهولة: احجز، عدل أو ألغِ الموعد بضغطة زر.
عرض سجل مواعيدك السابقة والقادمة ومتابعة حالتك أولاً بأول.
مع تطبيق عيادات الكسائي، جمالكِ بين يديكِ – احجزي الآن وابدئي رحلة التغيير الحقيقي.
نحن نؤمن أن الجمال يبدأ من العناية الصحيحة، ولذلك نحرص على تقديم أفضل الحلول الطبية والتجميلية مع تجربة استخدام سهلة وآمنة.
حمّلي تطبيق عيادات الكسائي الآن وتمتعي ببشرة صحية وشعر أقوى وجمال طبيعي يدوم.",2023-11-29T08:00:00Z,2025-07-29T12:25:31Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,18,1151403577,SMC Healthcare,SPECIALIZED MEDICAL CENTER HOSPITAL,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/smc-healthcare/id1151403577?uo=4,0.0,4.61721,12532,Medical,"SMC Healthcare is a leading hospitals group in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,19,6748008913,KFMMC Hospital,KFMMC,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/kfmmc-hospital/id6748008913?uo=4,0.0,2.28655,171,Medical,"This app allows users to book, view, and cancel appointments at King Fahd Military Medical Complex (KFMMC). Users can access their medical, discharge, operative, laboratory reports, vital signs, and view their personal and family medical cards. The app also provides features to request medical reports and manage pending medication refills. Overall, it serves as a comprehensive tool to help users manage and stay informed about their medical history and ongoing healthcare needs.
هذا التطبيق يسمح للمستخدمين بحجز المواعيد وعرضها وإلغائها لدى مجمع الملك فهد الطبي العسكري بالظهران.

يمكن للمستخدمين أيضا عرض تقارير الخروج والعمليات والتقارير الطبية وتقارير نتائج التحاليل والعلامات الحيوية. أيضا يمكنهم من عرض بطاقات عائلاتهم الطبية وطلب التقارير الطبية والأدوية المجدولة لإعادة الصرف.
بشكل عام فالتطبيق يقدم خدمات شاملة لمساعدة المستخدمين على البقاء على معرفة بتاريخهم الطبي واحتياجاتهم الصحية.",2025-08-26T07:00:00Z,2025-11-08T06:32:05Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,20,1473258160,سنار - Sanar | صحة أفضل,Sanar eCommerce Company LLC,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/%D8%B3%D9%86%D8%A7%D8%B1-sanar-%D8%B5%D8%AD%D8%A9-%D8%A3%D9%81%D8%B6%D9%84/id1473258160?uo=4,0.0,4.72813,11638,Medical,"Sanar is a Saudi MOH-licensed platform specializing in virtual primary care, offering convenient telemedicine consultations and access to a wide range of medical specialties, as well as comprehensive home healthcare services.
Our services include:
Telemedicine:
- Video/audio consultations with certified doctors and specialists across 25+ medical fields
- Instant access to general medicine, pediatrics, dermatology, cardiology, psychiatry/psychology, and more
- Chronic disease management and prescription refills
Home Medical Care:
- Lab tests: Access different lab testing services
- Nurse: Receive professional nursing care
- Home Visit Doctor: Schedule doctor visits to your home for personalized care
- Vitamin IV Drips: Receive IV vitamin therapy from the convenience of your home
- Physiotherapist: Get physiotherapy services without having to leave your home
- Radiology: Access radiology services from the convenience of your home
- Vaccination: Access vaccination services for both adults and children through Sanar.
- Caregiver Services: Health care companions available for children, the elderly, mothers, and post-surgery patients.
Additional  Services:
- Sanar Pharmacy: Order prescriptions with secure home delivery
Contact & Support:
- Email: Customercare@sanar.sa
- Website: www.sanar.sa
- Social Media: @SANARKSA (Instagram, X, YouTube, Facebook, TikTok, Snapchat)",2019-08-29T07:00:00Z,2025-09-16T10:36:26Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,21,1529172019,Estenarh - استنارة,Khalid Alshaer (SA),https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/estenarh-%D8%A7%D8%B3%D8%AA%D9%86%D8%A7%D8%B1%D8%A9/id1529172019?uo=4,0.0,4.8206,7787,Medical,"The Estenarh app, approved by the Ministry of Health, offers the best online therapy and counseling from licensed therapists and psychologists for medical, psychological, social, and family support. Accessible and private, Estenarh is a therapy app for diverse needs, from individual therapy needs and online therapy for teens to online couples therapy and online therapy sessions for families.

Estenarh specializes in various mental health areas including stress, anxiety, depression, teen issues, marriage counseling, divorce, post-separation crises, obsessive-compulsive disorder, sleep disturbance, mood disorders, and more.
Estenarh App Features:
Complete privacy: Secure encryption ensures confidentiality in all online therapy communications.
Experienced Online Therapists: Professional online psychologists and counselors with extensive expertise.
Affordable therapy options: Flexible payment methods for all.
Multiple communication options: Choose text, phone, or video for your online counseling sessions.
Instant Booking: Start therapy online in less than 5 minutes.
Reliable Reviews: Verified authentic reviews from real Estenarh users.
Easy Booking: Flexible appointment scheduling and booking available all day.
Let us help you take steps toward a happier and healthier life with support that’s always at your fingertips through the Estenarh mental health app.",2020-11-12T08:00:00Z,2025-11-18T15:12:40Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,22,1474060887,King Fahad Armed Forces,King Fahd Armed Forces Hospital,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/king-fahad-armed-forces/id1474060887?uo=4,0.0,2.02542,236,Medical,"حرصا من  مستشفى الملك فهد للقوات المسلحة بجده لتقديم افضل الخدمات للمرضى  تم تطوير تطبيق بوابة المريض للهواتف المحمولة ليقدم خدمات إلكترونية لمرضى ومن ضمنها وليس محصورا عليها:
1.      خدمة حجز موعد.
2.      خدمة استعراض المواعيد القادمة
3.      خدمة استعراض نتائج المختبر
4.      خدمة استعراض تقارير الاشعة
5.      خدمة استعراض الملف الطبي
6.  خدمة عرض جميع أفراد العائلة
*** ملاحظة يرجي استخدام إسم المستخدم وكلمة المرور الخاصة بك في بوابة المريض

King Fahad Armed Hospital(KFAFH) has successfully developed a patients portal mobile application (PATTAL);  the patients will be able to view all aspects related to their medical information using their mobile phones.
The application provide numerous services including (and not limit to):
1.      Booking appointments
2.      Viewing future appointment
3.      Viewing lab results
4.      Viewing radiology reports
5.      Viewing prescriptions  history
6.    Viewing  the medical file

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,23,950285659,SFHP Riyadh,Security Forces Hospital,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/sfhp-riyadh/id950285659?uo=4,0.0,1.72174,690,Medical,"يقدم تطبيق برنامج مستشفى قوى الأمن للأجهزة الذكية على منصة التطوير أبل و أندرويد  عدد من الخدمات التفاعلية الهامة للمريض والتي تساهم في تقديم الخدمة للمريض عن بعد دون الحاجة لتواجد المريض بالمستشفى.  حيث يقدم التطبيق المعلومات الخاصة بملف المريض و معلومات أفراد أسرة المريض المرتبطين به وخدمات الإستعلام عن المواعيد الخاصة بهم مع وجود رسائل نصية للتذكير بالمواعيد.
أيضاً يقدم التطبيق خدمات الإطلاع على السجل الدوائي للمريض و طلب إعادة صرف الدواء. وخدمة الإطلاع على عدد من التقارير الطبية كتقرير الأشعة و التقارير الطبية و إشعار المراجعة.
ويستطيع المريض التواصل مع المستشفى و تحديد الإدارة التي يرغب بالتواصل معها و متابعة  الطلب الذي يتواصل مع المستشفى بشأنة عن طريق خدمة تواصل معنا الذي يقدمها التطبيق.
كما سيتم الإستمرار بإضافة عدد جديد من الخدمات الإلكترونية للمريض لهذا التطبيق بما يساهم في تقديم خدمات طبية ترتقي لرضى المريض.
نرحب بالإقتراحات والملاحظات.",2015-01-21T07:33:16Z,2020-01-23T06:15:53Z

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,24,1495041933,Care Medical,NATIONAL MEDICAL CARE CO,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/care-medical/id1495041933?uo=4,0.0,3.08537,82,Medical,"Care Hospitals mobile application gives you access to a lot of services.

sa,Saudi Arabia,Medical,6020,25,6444257600,SiHi | صحي,king saud university - Medical city,https://apps.apple.com/sa/app/sihi-%D8%B5%D8%AD%D9%8A/id6444257600?uo=4,0.0,4.70781,5866,Medical,"Welcome to the Patient Portal of the Medical City at King Saud University - SiHi:
